flavorText:
"We have more sprouts than they have hands."
—Gamelen, Citanul elder

foreignData.name: Größeres Wohl
foreignData.text: Opfere eine Kreatur: Ziehe so viele Karten, wie die geopferte Kreatur Stärke hatte. Wähle dann drei Karten aus Deiner Hand und wirf diese ab.

name: Greater Good
originalText: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then choose and discard three cards.

rulings.text: Use the sacrificed creature's power as it last existed on the battlefield to determine how many cards you draw.
If you don't have three cards in hand when instructed to discard three cards, you discard your hand.
You draw and discard cards all while Greater Good's ability is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions.

text: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.
